div.p: The Facsimile View shows digital copies of the Edirom Online Object; if there are no digital facsimiles associated with the object, the view will not be offered for that specific object.

View specific toolbar items:
horizontal slider
use for zoom settings of the current facsimile page left arrow head, input field, right arrow head
use arrow heads to flip pages, use input field to enter page number or label directly; when inputting a page number or label a filtered list will appear showing all pages starting with the entered string. Darstellung
